hero.subtitle: See what's available. Pick a time. You're done.

step1.title: Find
step1.description: Browse businesses near you or search for exactly what you need.

step2.title: Pick
step2.description: See available times in real-time. Choose what works for you.

step3.title: Done
step3.description: Confirm your booking. Get instant confirmation. That's it.

useCases.label: Two sides of the same story
useCases.title: Built for everyone
useCases.subtitle: Whether you're booking or managing appointments, rivo makes it effortless.

customer.title: For Customers
customer.description: Book appointments in seconds. See real-time availability, pick your time, and get instant confirmation—all from your phone.
customer.imageAlt: Customer booking appointment on mobile phone

business.title: For Business Owners
business.description: Manage your calendar, track bookings, and grow your business—all from a simple, elegant dashboard.
business.imageAlt: Business owner managing bookings on tablet

forBusiness.label: For Business Owners
forBusiness.title: Run a business?
forBusiness.trustSignal: No credit card required • Set up in minutes

search.placeholder: Search by business, service, or category...

noResults.title: No businesses found
noResults.description: Try adjusting your search or filters

landing.title: Manage your booking
landing.subtitle: Enter your Booking ID and email to access your appointment.
landing.validationError: Please enter both your Booking ID and email address.
landing.successMessage: Check your email for a link to manage your appointment.
landing.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
landing.connectionError: Unable to connect. Please check your connection and try again.
landing.helpText: Your Booking ID was provided when you made your reservation. Check your confirmation email if you cannot find it.

details.title: Booking Details
details.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment?

reschedule.title: Reschedule Appointment
reschedule.importantMessage: After rescheduling, your access link will be refreshed for security. You'll need to request a new link to make any additional changes.
reschedule.noSlots: No available slots for this date. Try another date.
reschedule.successMessage: Your appointment has been successfully rescheduled. A confirmation email has been sent to you.
reschedule.successNote: Note: Your access link has been refreshed. To make further changes, please request a new access link from the manage booking page.
reschedule.serviceMissing: Service information is missing. Please try booking again or contact support.

booking.errorMessage: This booking page is not available

service.title: Choose a Service
service.subtitle: Select the service you'd like to book

datetime.title: Pick Date & Time
datetime.subtitle: Choose when you'd like to come
datetime.noSlotsAvailable: No time slots available for this date

details.title: Your Details
details.subtitle: Enter your information to complete the booking
details.name: Name
details.signupDescription: Create an account to manage your bookings
details.signupBenefit: Create an account to track all your bookings in one place and rebook faster next time.
details.provideEmailOrPhone: Provide at least email or phone (or both)
details.loginPromptMessage: Log in to your account for faster bookings and to view your appointment history.
details.emailOrPhoneRequired: Please provide at least an email or phone number
details.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
details.customerOnly: This login is for customers only. Business owners should use the owner login.
details.bookingFailed: Failed to create booking. Please try again.
details.paymentNotice: You will pay at the time of your appointment. No payment is required now.

confirmation.title: Booking Confirmed!
confirmation.message: Your appointment has been successfully booked. A confirmation email has been sent to

auth.title: Register Your Business
auth.subtitle: Do you already have an owner account?

business.title: Business Information
business.subtitle: Tell us about your business
business.subdomainHelp: Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.subtitle: How can customers reach you?
contact.addressInfo: Type your address below and select it from the dropdown. This will automatically fill in all fields and set your map location for customer discovery.
contact.addressNote: Currently optimized for Italian addresses. Worldwide support coming soon.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: What services do you offer?
services.skipNote: You can skip this step and add services later in your dashboard

builder.noServicesHelp: Click "Add Category" above to create your first service category

availability.title: Availability
availability.subtitle: When are you open for bookings?
availability.advancedTip: Tip: Add breaks for lunch or split shifts
availability.advancedExample: For example: 9:00-13:00 and 14:00-18:00 for a lunch break
availability.simpleModeNote: Need different hours for each day or lunch breaks? Switch to Advanced mode.

rules.title: Booking Rules
rules.subtitle: Configure how bookings work for your business
rules.timeSlotHelp: How often time slots appear in your calendar (e.g., 30 = slots every 30 minutes). Must be a multiple of 5.
rules.maxSimultaneousHelp: How many customers can book the same time slot (useful for group classes or multiple staff members). Can be customized per service later.
rules.advanceBookingHelp: Maximum days in the future customers can book (e.g., 30 = customers can book up to 30 days ahead)

details.title: Additional Details
details.subtitle: Optional settings you can modify later in the dashboard
details.minAdvanceHelp: How far in advance customers must book (e.g., 60 = 1 hour)
details.skipNote: You can skip this step and modify these settings later in your dashboard

review.title: Review & Submit
review.subtitle: Check your information before creating your business

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address (e.g., you@business.com)
validation.passwordRequired: Password is required to secure your account
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters for security
validation.passwordWeak: Password should contain both letters and numbers
validation.businessNameRequired: Business name is required - this is how customers will find you
validation.businessNameTooShort: Business name must be at least 2 characters
validation.businessNameTooLong: Business name is too long (maximum 100 characters)
validation.subdomainRequired: Subdomain is required for your booking page URL
validation.subdomainInvalid: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens allowed (e.g., bella-salon)
validation.subdomainTooShort: Subdomain must be at least 3 characters
validation.subdomainHyphens: Subdomain cannot start or end with a hyphen
validation.subdomainReserved: This subdomain is reserved. Please choose another
validation.urlInvalid: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., https://example.com)
validation.urlProtocol: URL must start with http:// or https://
validation.colorInvalid: Invalid color format. Use hex format (e.g., #10b981)
validation.streetRequired: Street address is required for customer directions
validation.cityRequired: City is required for location display
validation.postalCodeRequired: Postal code is required for accurate geocoding
validation.addressRequired: Please select an address from the autocomplete dropdown to set your map location. This is required for business discovery.
validation.categoryNameRequired: All categories must have a name
validation.categoryServicesRequired: Category "{{name}}" must have at least one service
validation.serviceNameRequired: All services in "{{category}}" must have a name
validation.serviceDurationMin: Service "{{name}}" duration must be at least 5 minutes
validation.serviceDurationMultiple: Service "{{name}}" duration must be a multiple of 5 minutes
validation.availabilityRequired: You must be open at least one day per week to accept bookings
validation.availabilityInvalidTime: {{day}}: Closing time must be after opening time
validation.timeSlotRange: Time slot must be between 5 minutes and 8 hours (480 minutes)
validation.timeSlotMultiple: Time slot duration must be a multiple of 5 minutes
validation.maxBookingsMin: Must allow at least 1 booking per time slot
validation.advanceBookingRange: Advance booking must be between 1 and 365 days

errors.existingAccount: An account with this email already exists. Please enter your password to continue.
